import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get survey response for a ticket"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/responses/ticket/{TicketId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieves the survey response submitted for a specific ticket, if one exists.

**Prerequisites**
1. **TicketId** - The ticket must have had a survey assigned and completed.

**Workflow Example**
1. Get ticket details (via Tickets API) to confirm ticket ID
2. Check for response: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/responses/ticket/\{TicketId\}
3. If response exists, review `OverallSatisfaction` and individual `Responses`
4. If no response, check pending: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{UserId\}/pending](/docs/api/surveys/get-pending-surveys)

**Use Cases**:
- Display satisfaction rating on ticket detail page
- Include survey feedback in ticket reports
- Verify survey was completed before closing follow-up

**Notes**: Returns null `Item` if no survey response exists for the ticket.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"TicketId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"},"description":"UUID of the ticket. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets), extract `Items[].TicketId`."},"description":"Unique identifier of the ticket."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

/api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"}},"CreatedDate":{"type":"string","format":"date-time","description":"When the response was
